services.title: Fractional Tech Leadership
services.description: Experienced technical leadership without the full-time commitment. I help organizations navigate complex technical decisions, build and mentor teams, and establish processes that scale.

services.title: Prototyping & Concept Development
services.description: Rapidly transform ideas into tangible artifacts. I build working prototypes that help validate concepts, secure funding, and align stakeholders before significant investment.

services.title: AI Capability Exploration
services.description: Cut through the AI hype cycle. I help organizations identify practical applications of AI that solve real problems, focusing on implementation rather than speculation.

services.title: Strategic Advising / Executive Collaboration
services.description: Bridge the gap between business strategy and technical execution. I work directly with executives to translate vision into actionable technical roadmaps.
